channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
I now I might sound noobish, but this is my first time to edit a server, and I want to ask a few questions which I need help with.
1.How do I get other people to join my server? e.g. Where would they put my ip address to be able to conncet to it?
2.On the "use this for admins" and "use this for new people" do I change the username and password for my friends, or do I just leave it as it is?
I think thats it for now, but I will ask some more if I need any help, thank you.

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @drgn24b drgn24b
item.description:
@drgn24b wrote:

ok, thank you, also i need to know how to make a client to work with moparscape, as in explai the whole proccess of opening certain files to get moparscape working with a client.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

1.How do I get other people to join my server? e.g. Where would they put my ip address to be able to conncet to it?

Download hamachi or no-ip. No-ip us much butter, make your own ip for your server then advertise it.

Read full topic
